name: Alvaro Bramastio
summary: Experienced Senior Frontend & Shopify developer with 7+ years, specializing in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and Shopify integrations. Skilled at building scalable, high-performance web and eCommerce applications with clean architecture and reusable components. Adept at leading teams, mentoring juniors, and delivering seamless user experiences. Passionate about driving innovation in Web3 and modern web technologies.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.summary: Focused on building high-performance, responsive, and component-driven web applications using Next.js for the frontend and Shopify for backend integrations. Emphasized clean architecture, reusable code, and smooth user experiences across devices.
highlights: Developed Next.js applications with a strong focus on performance, SEO, and scalability.
Integrated Shopify backend APIs to manage products, carts, and checkout flows.
Built custom Shopify storefronts using React components and dynamic data fetching.
Implemented responsive, accessible UIs with optimized animations and transitions.
Worked with REST and GraphQL APIs for data handling and dynamic content.
Collaborated on design implementation, ensuring pixel-perfect and user-focused interfaces.
Managed version control and deployments using Git / GitHub and modern build tools.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.summary: Focused on building dynamic, component-driven web applications using Next.js and Node.js. Emphasized code reusability, UI performance, and responsive design, ensuring seamless experiences across devices.
highlights: Developed modern, server-rendered applications with Next.js, improving performance and SEO.
Built reusable components and optimized code structure for scalability.
Enhanced UI/UX through smooth animations, transitions, and accessibility best practices.
Integrated RESTful APIs and handled client-server data efficiently with Node.js.
Focused on responsive layouts, ensuring pixel-perfect and performant interfaces across devices.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.summary: I build clean, responsive, and accessible user interfaces with a strong focus on usability, performance, and design precision. I enjoy transforming complex ideas into intuitive, user-friendly web applications and continuously improving both code quality and user experience.
highlights: Developed fully responsive layouts using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript â€” ensuring seamless performance across all devices and browsers.
Implemented pixel-perfect designs and optimized pages for speed and accessibility.
Wrote semantic, maintainable code with a focus on best practices and reusability.
Partnered closely with design and backend teams to bring mockups and business logic to life through functional, elegant interfaces.
Built enterprise-grade applications with React and TypeScript, leveraging RxJS for reactive data flows and lazy loading for performance.
Created modular, reusable components and implemented route guards to enhance both maintainability and security.
Worked in Agile teams, contributing to code reviews, architecture planning, and continuous improvement.
